description: A virtual application function. For example, an aws_lambda_function, azure_function, or google_cloud_function

image.description: The image of this function, typically refers to a zip package.

runtime.description: The runtime of this function. For example: 'nodejs6.10', 'nodejs8.10', or 'python2.7'.

memorySize.description: The allocated memory of this function to execute.

codeSize.description: The size of code of this function.

codeHash.description: The hash of code of this function.

trigger.description: What triggers this function to execute.
